newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Morgan & Banks shares surge to high.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Morgan & Banks shares surge to high.

text.p: Shares in finance personnel placement agency, Morgan & Banks Ltd, surged 70 cents to a record high of A$6.00 on Friday following a strong half year profit result, brokers said.
On Thursday, the company posted a 60 percent jump in net profit to A$4.62 million, struck on 55 percent higher revenues of A$100.6 million for the six months to September 30.
"It's on the back of their results," said a Sydney-based dealer.
"They are not normally an active stock but it has brought some interest out."
The bulk of trade was in two lines totalling 750,000 shares.
One line of 400,000 shares was specialled through SBC Warburg at a price of A$6.00 per share while another line of 350,000 shares was specialled through Lodge Finlay at a price of A$6.125 per share.
Morgan & Banks shares closed 70 cents higher at A$6.00 on turnover of 809,370 shares.
